price: អ្នកទាំងនោះនឹងទទួលបានផលល្អពីអ្វីដែលពួកគេបាន សាង។ ហើយអល់ឡោះជាអ្នកកាត់សេចក្ដីយ៉ាងរហ័សបំផុត។
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّمَّا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: ulāika lahum naṣībun mimmā kasabū wal-lahu sarīʿu al-ḥisābi
